'Solar Cookers International' ('SCI') is a California 501(c)(3) nonprofit, non-
governmental organization (NGO) that spreads solar cooking awareness and skills
worldwide, particularly in areas with plentiful sunshine and diminishing sources
of cooking fuel. SCI has been working in Africa since 1995.

SCI sponsors the Solar Cookers World Network, an association of approximately
500 NGOs, manufacturers, and individuals involved in solar cooking. It also
publishes Solar Cooker Review. SCI won an Ashden Award in 2002 for their work
with solar cookers in Kenya. SCI is headquartered in Sacramento,
California, US.
